#summary Compiling ImageListView without Windows Imaging Component
#labels Phase-Implementation

Although ImageListView requires the .NET framework 3.0; it is possible to recompile it for .NET 2.0 without Windows Imaging Component.

  # [http://code.google.com/p/imagelistview/downloads/list Download] or [http://code.google.com/p/imagelistview/source/checkout checkout] the latest source code.
  # Open project properties and change the target framework to .NET 2.0 in the Application tab.
  # Delete the USEWIC conditional compilation symbol from the Build tab.
  # Recompile the project.
